title: SHACO BOXES DO NOT PROC SPELLTHIEFS
body:
I AM AN AVID SUPPORTER OF SHACO SUPPORT (HAH) AND AN SHOCKINGLY DISGUSTED TO FIND OUT THAT SHACO'S BOXES DO NOT PROC SPELLTHIEF'S EDGE'S PASSIVE. I AM DISAPPOINTED IN YOU RIOT. I NEED THIS FIXED ASAP. LANING AS SHACO SUPPORT IS TOUGH ENOUGH WITH ALL THE ZYRAS AND MFS THESE DAYS, BUT IF GOT THOSE DAMN SPELLTHIEF PROCS OFF MY BOXES, MY DAYS WOULD BE A LOT LIVELIER.

THANK YOU.

replies.body:
Also, on a similar subject - why can Shacos boxes be blown up by spells, yet Zyras plants have to be specifically auto'd, each one, to destroy them, multiple times.

The logic in this game is annoying
You can kill Zyra's plants with spells, though I believe there is a limit on the amount of damage they can take from one attack, spell or otherwise.
True, but still leaves the same problem because you need to waste 2 or 3 spell casts on them. Whereas with the boxes, they can just be insta-deleted without a second though by the enemies

But you can't hurt the Shaco boxes when they are invisible, and they go invisible in about a second (might even be a little less) so unless you're really on that shit when he places it (and good luck one shotting it if you're a support or tank) you aren't gonna be able to kill the box, you can't hit it while you're feared by which point it's done it's job. Not to mention that until Zyra gets some points in her W the plants are hella squishy.

tl;dr they both have their strengths and weaknesses appropriate to their function in each champions kit.
maybe try playing a proper support or short of that a "mage support"
I guess you didn't see worlds then?

Does Zyra's plants proc Spellthiefs?

If they do, then they should fix it.
They do, which is pretty ridiculous considering it takes no skill to get procs off those
